targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all_delta_1m")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Tokyo")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d, location: location)
today_9 = date.add(to: today_start, d: 9h)

yesterday_9 = date.add(to: today_9, d: -24h)

// 現在が今日の9時より前なら昨日の9時、それ以降なら今日の9時
start = if now() < today_9 then yesterday_9 else today_9

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> reduce(
      fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
        first: if accumulator.initialized then accumulator.first else float(v: r._value),
        last: float(v: r._value),
        initialized: true
      }),
      identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, initialized: false}
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.last - r.first}))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "credit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["user"] == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -24h) // 直近24時間
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)

import "date"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      time: r._time,
      value: r._value,
  }))

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ball_get")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_ball_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
          if r._field == "dc_ball_get_0" then "ノーマル"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_1" then "橙"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_2" then "緑"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_3" then "虹"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_4" then "ピンク"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_5" then "紫"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_6" then "白"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_7" then "水色"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_8" then "灰桜"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_9" then "群青"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_10" then "赤"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_11" then "クリーム"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_12" then "ミント"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_13" then "ピーチ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_14" then "星空"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_15" then "草原"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_16" then "黒"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_100" then "ゴールデン"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_101" then "アメジスト"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_102" then "エメラルド"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_103" then "ローズクォーツ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_334" then "抽選"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_335" then "抽選（特殊効果）"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_ball_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

import "strings"

data = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_ball_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
          if r._field == "dc_ball_get_0" then "ノーマル"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_1" then "橙"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_2" then "緑"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_3" then "虹"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_4" then "ピンク"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_5" then "紫"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_6" then "白"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_7" then "水色"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_8" then "灰桜"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_9" then "群青"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_10" then "赤"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_11" then "クリーム"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_12" then "ミント"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_13" then "ピーチ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_14" then "星空"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_15" then "草原"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_16" then "黒"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_100" then "ゴールデン"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_101" then "アメジスト"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_102" then "エメラルド"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_103" then "ローズクォーツ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_334" then "抽選"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_335" then "抽選（特殊効果）"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_ball_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

totals = data
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "total"})

join(
  tables: {d: data, t: totals},
  on: ["_time"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _field: r._field,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / float(v: r.total) * 100.0
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_ball_chain_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
          if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_0" then "ノーマル"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_1" then "橙"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_2" then "緑"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_3" then "虹"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_4" then "ピンク"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_5" then "紫"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_6" then "白"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_7" then "水色"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_8" then "灰桜"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_9" then "群青"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_10" then "赤"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_11" then "クリーム"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_12" then "ミント"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_13" then "ピーチ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_14" then "星空"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_15" then "草原"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_16" then "黒"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_100" then "ゴールデン"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_101" then "アメジスト"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_102" then "エメラルド"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_103" then "ローズクォーツ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_334" then "抽選"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_chain_335" then "抽選（特殊効果）"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_ball_chain_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_medal_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
        if r._field == "dc_medal_get_0" then "ノーマル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_1" then "橙(ルーレット)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_2" then "緑"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_3" then "ピンク"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_4" then "紫"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_5" then "水色"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_6" then "壁メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_7" then "スキルメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_12" then "緑10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_13" then "赤10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_14" then "紫10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_15" then "ゴールデンメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_16" then "棒金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_17" then "デカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_18" then "クソデカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_100" then "虹メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_101" then "金メダル(ボツ枠)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_102" then "サファイア"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_103" then "ルビー"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_104" then "エメラルド"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_105" then "ダイヤモンド"
        else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_medal_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

import "strings"

data = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_medal_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _field:
        if r._field == "dc_medal_get_0" then "ノーマル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_1" then "橙(ルーレット)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_2" then "緑"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_3" then "ピンク"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_4" then "紫"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_5" then "水色"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_6" then "壁メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_7" then "スキルメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_12" then "緑10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_13" then "赤10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_14" then "紫10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_15" then "ゴールデンメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_16" then "棒金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_17" then "デカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_18" then "クソデカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_100" then "虹メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_101" then "金メダル(ボツ枠)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_102" then "サファイア"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_103" then "ルビー"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_104" then "エメラルド"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_105" then "ダイヤモンド"
        else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_medal_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

totals = data
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "total"})

join(
  tables: {d: data, t: totals},
  on: ["_time"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _field: r._field,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / float(v: r.total) * 100.0
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "medal_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
